item.title: Google Analytics and Hugo
item.description: So you want to add GA4 to your Hugo website? Here is a step-by-step guide to adding Google Analytics to your Hugo website. Setup a Google Analytics account Head over here and make an account (or sign in if you already have one). Create a property (accessed through admin), add a stream, and point it to your site URL. Once done, head over to admin > property > Data Streams and go to your newly created stream.

item.title: How to Custom Domain
item.description: So you want a custom domain name? Here is a step-by-step guide to how to get one (for free) from freenom. I use github pages to host my hugo website so the tutorial will focus on the relevant steps. Check availability of a domain name In the search bar, type out the site name that you want, say example.com. It should give you a few alternatives such as shown in the picture.
